title: Assetion failure apfloat::ieee::Single gave different result for `1.0` on powerpcspe

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I have cross-compiled rustc_1.24 with backported patches to support the powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe port.

Trying to build cargo fails with the Rust compiler generating an assertion failure:

```
   Compiling num-traits v0.1.41
     Running `rustc --crate-name num_traits debian/../vendor/num-traits-0.1.41/src/lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=53fabe88e21e474f -C extra-filename=-53fabe88e21e474f --out-dir /home/cargo-0.24.0/target/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe/release/deps --target powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe -L dependency=/home/cargo-0.24.0/target/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe/release/deps -L dependency=/home/cargo-0.24.0/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow -C linker=powerpc-linux-gnuspe-gcc -C link-arg=-Wl,-z,relro -C linker=powerpc-linux-gnuspe-gcc -C link-arg=-Wl,-z,relro`
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.24.0-dev running on powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe

note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'apfloat::ieee::Single gave different result for `1.0`: 1(0x3f800000) vs Rust's 0(0x0)', src/librustc_const_math/float.rs:84:17
note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace.
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
   1: std::sys_common::backtrace::print
   2: std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}
   3: std::panicking::default_hook
   4: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   5: std::panicking::begin_panic
   6: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
   7: rustc_const_math::float::ConstFloat::from_str
   8: rustc_const_eval::eval::eval_const_expr_partial
   9: rustc_const_eval::eval::ConstContext::eval
  10: <rustc_passes::consts::CheckCrateVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_expr
  11: rustc::hir::intravisit::walk_decl
  12: rustc::hir::intravisit::walk_expr
  13: <rustc_passes::consts::CheckCrateVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_expr
  14: rustc::hir::intravisit::walk_expr
  15: <rustc_passes::consts::CheckCrateVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_expr
  16: rustc::hir::intravisit::walk_expr
  17: <rustc_passes::consts::CheckCrateVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_expr
  18: <rustc_passes::consts::CheckCrateVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_nested_body
  19: rustc_passes::consts::rvalue_promotable_map
  20: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::rvalue_promotable_map<'tcx>>::compute_result
  21: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl
  22: rustc_errors::Handler::track_diagnostics
  23: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::cycle_check
  24: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::rvalue_promotable_map<'tcx>>::force
  25: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::rvalue_promotable_map<'tcx>>::try_get
  26: rustc::ty::maps::TyCtxtAt::rvalue_promotable_map
  27: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'tcx, 'lcx>>::rvalue_promotable_map
  28: rustc_passes::consts::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static
  29: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static<'tcx>>::compute_result
  30: rustc::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl
  31: rustc_errors::Handler::track_diagnostics
  32: rustc::ty::maps::plumbing::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'gcx, 'tcx>>::cycle_check
  33: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static<'tcx>>::force
  34: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::maps::queries::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static<'tcx>>::try_get
  35: rustc::ty::maps::TyCtxtAt::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static
  36: rustc::ty::maps::<impl rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt<'a, 'tcx, 'lcx>>::const_is_rvalue_promotable_to_static
  37: rustc_passes::consts::check_crate
  38: rustc::util::common::time
  39: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  40: <std::thread::local::LocalKey<T>>::with
  41: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::create_and_enter
  42: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  43: rustc_driver::run_compiler

error: Could not compile `num-traits`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name num_traits debian/../vendor/num-traits-0.1.41/src/lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=53fabe88e21e474f -C extra-filename=-53fabe88e21e474f --out-dir /home/cargo-0.24.0/target/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe/release/deps --target powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe -L dependency=/home/cargo-0.24.0/target/powerpc-unknown-linux-gnuspe/release/deps -L dependency=/home/cargo-0.24.0/target/release/deps --cap-lints allow -C linker=powerpc-linux-gnuspe-gcc -C link-arg=-Wl,-z,relro -C linker=powerpc-linux-gnuspe-gcc -C link-arg=-Wl,-z,relro` (exit code: 101)
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
make[1]: *** [debian/rules:64: override_dh_auto_build-arch] Error 101
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/cargo-0.24.0'
make: *** [debian/rules:35: build-arch] Error 2
dpkg-buildpackage: error: debian/rules build-arch subprocess returned exit status 2
```

CC @jrtc27
CC @mkarcher
